alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 2:19PM PST until December 30 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation above 4500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with up to 10 inches across the highest elevations. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. In Washington, South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
